snippet: To promote a show of seascapes, a museum in Virginia is challenging visitors to find a forged painting hung alongside the real ones.
abstract: Mariners’ Museum in Newport News, Va, hopes to boost attendance for exhibition of James E Buttersworth paintings by including one forgery and challenging visitors to pick it out.
lead_paragraph: To promote a show of seascapes, a museum in Virginia is challenging visitors to find a forged painting hung alongside the real ones.

headline.main: To Reel In Crowds, a Museum Is Showing a Fake Painting
headline.print_headline: Guess Which One Is Fake: A Museum’s Sly Strategy
